about_the_game:
This Bloom and Doom Pack includes 33 insect-themed Clothing Items, 9 insect-themed Furniture Items, 1 insect-themed Mount, and 2 insect-themed Pets.

Get your bug nets ready! The Bloom and Doom Pack has 45 cute and crawly-themed items that will add the perfect jungle flair to any farm.

Pack includes:
  • Death Blossom Furniture Set: Death Blossom Chair, Death Blossom Table, Death Blossom Couch, Death Blossom Wardrobe, Death Blossom End Table, Death Blossom Bed, Death Blossom Lamp, Death Blossom Record Player, and Death Blossom Rug
  • Wasp Outfit Set: Wasp Helmet, Wasp Chest Plate, and Wasp Grieves
  • Dragonfly Outfit Set: Dragonfly Antenna Headband, Dragonfly Shirt, Dragonfly Pants, and Dragonfly Wing Cape
  • Carnivorous Outfit Set: Carnivorous Bonnet, Carnivorous Crop Top, and Carnivorous Skirt
  • Mantis Outfit Set: Mantis Antenna Headband and Mantis Cloak
  • Venus Fly Trap Outfit Set: Venus Fly Trap Hood, Venus Fly Trap Shawl, Venus Fly Trap Skirt, and Venus Fly Trap Cape
  • Bee Outfit Set: Bee Antenna Hat, Bee Chest Plate, Bee Wing Cape, and Bee Grieves
  • Blooming Warrior Outfit Set: Blooming Warrior Crest, Blooming Warrior Top, Blooming Warrior Skirt, and Blooming Warrior Cape
  • Royal Blossom Outfit Set: Royal Blossom Hairpiece and Royal Blossom Dress
  • Lily Blossom Outfit Set: Lily Blossom Hat, Lily Blossom Robe, and Lily Blossom Pants
  • Moth Outfit Set: Moth Antenna Headband, Moth Chest Plate, Moth Grieves, and Moth Wing Cape
  • Monster Moth Mount
  • Beezy Buzz, the Bee Pet
  • Bingle, the Bush Pet
